actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on District of Columbia.  Report No: 97-43.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Passed House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 239 - 149 (Record Vote No: 165).
Laid on Table in House by Unanimous Consent.
Other Measure S.640 (Amended) Passed House in Lieu.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to extend the authority of the Mayor to accept certain interim loans from the United States and to extend the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to make such loans.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #165 (239-149)) Amends the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to extend the interim loan authority of the Mayor of the District of Columbia to October 1, 1982, or the date of enactment of the fiscal year 1983 appropriation Act for the District, whichever is later.

titles.title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Self-Government and Governmental Reorganization Act to extend the authority of the Mayor to accept certain interim loans from the United States and to extend the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to make such loans.
